title: Except those buildings affected by setback of important roads from the point of view of their widening, in all other cases repairs will be allowed inclusive of setbacks, with registered undertaking for not claiming any compensation on account of repairs for the structure and shall handover the portion of road setback as per prevailing policy/provision, when required by MCGM
clause_text: Except those buildings affected by setback of important roads from the point of view of their widening, in all other cases repairs will be allowed inclusive of setbacks, with registered undertaking for not claiming any compensation on account of repairs for the structure and shall handover the portion of road setback as per prevailing policy/provision, when required by MCGM. The provision of Twin column arrangement shall be insisted at the sanctioned R.L / D.P. Road so as to detach the part of the building falling within the setback as and when required by MCGM for widening of roads.
